data.name: intro
data.copy: In a digital world filled with spammers, filters, and phishers, brands everywhere rely on the “email heroes” within their ranks to improve and optimize their email marketing programs. The powers these email heroes possess are vast, and each helps them deliver not only emails, but results. What’s your power?

data.name: heroes
data.copy: Take a short quiz to reveal your email strategy’s super power. Choose one of the super powers above to test your knowledge and reveal your strengths. You’ll learn which powers you already possess and how to unlock even more potential.
